TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit SqlContext extends System.Object

summary.span: 表示呼叫端內容的抽象，提供對 、 和 物件的存取。

span.span: Represents an abstraction of the caller's context, which provides access to the , , and objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 物件可以用來取得該觸發程序內容 （適用於觸發程序中執行的程式碼） 和管道物件 （可用時，例如預存程序）。The object can be used to obtain the trigger context (for code executing in a trigger) and the pipe object (when available, such as in stored procedures). 它也可用來取得物件，表示呼叫的用戶端，Microsoft Windows 身分識別，如果用戶端驗證伺服器使用整合式驗證。It can also be used to obtain a object that represents the Microsoft Windows identity of the calling client, if the client authenticated with the server using integrated authentication. ## Examples 下列範例會建立新及其。The following example creates a new and its . 範例接著標示結果集使用的開頭方法，會將範例資料與記錄傳送回用戶端會使用方法，並以設定結果的結尾標記方法。The example then marks the beginning of a result set using the method, sends records with example data back to the client using the method, and marks the end of the result set with the method. [!code-csharp[DataWorks SqlPipe.SendResultsRow#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks SqlPipe.SendResultsRow/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[DataWorks SqlPipe.SendResultsRow#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks SqlPipe.SendResultsRow/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property IsAvailable As Boolean
public: static property bool IsAvailable { bool get(); };

summary.span: 指定呼叫程式碼是否在 SQL Server 中執行，且是否可存取內容連接。

span.span: Specifies whether the calling code is running within SQL Server, and if the context connection can be accessed.

value.span: 如果內容連接可用且可存取其他 成員，則為 。

span.span: if the context connection is available and the other members can be accessed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果這個屬性會傳回 false，所有其他成員擲回如果使用。If this property returns false, all the other members throw an if used. 如果這個屬性會傳回 false，任何嘗試開啟連接物件的 「 內容連接 = true"的連接字串中會失敗。If this property returns false, any attempt to open a connection object that has "context connection=true" in the connection string fails. 這個屬性是唯讀的。This property is read-only. 如果一段程式碼可能會執行 （使用 common language runtime 整合） 的 SQL Server 內部和外部 SQL Server，請使用 ADO.NET 存取資料，這個屬性可用來檢查是否可以使用內容連接。When using ADO.NET for data-access, if a piece of code may run both inside SQL Server (using common language runtime integration) and outside SQL Server, this property can be used to check whether the context connection is available.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property Pipe As SqlPipe
public: static property Microsoft::SqlServer::Server::SqlPipe ^ Pipe { Microsoft::SqlServer::Server::SqlPipe ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得管道物件，允許呼叫端將結果集、訊息和執行命令的結果傳送回用戶端。

span.span: Gets the pipe object that allows the caller to send result sets, messages, and the results of executing commands back to the client.

value.span: 如果管道可用，則為 的執行個體 (Instance)；如果在管道不可用的內容中呼叫 (例如，在使用者定義函式中)，則為 。

span.span: An instance of if a pipe is available, or if called in a context where pipe is not available (for example, in a user-defined function).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果從 SQL Server 外部，叫用就會擲回。If invoked from outside SQL Server, a is thrown. 這個屬性是唯讀的。This property is read-only.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property TriggerContext As SqlTriggerContext

summary.span: 取得觸發程序內容，用於向呼叫端提供何者引發觸發程序的相關資訊，以及更新之資料行的對應。

span.span: Gets the trigger context used to provide the caller with information about what caused the trigger to fire, and a map of the columns that were updated.

value.span: 如果觸發程序內容可用，則為 的執行個體；如果從觸發程序引動過程外部呼叫，則為 。

span.span: An instance of if a trigger context is available, or if called outside of a trigger invocation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 只可擷取物件從通用語言執行階段觸發程序內。The object can only be retrieved from within a common language runtime trigger. 如果從 SQL Server 外部存取屬性就會擲回。If the property is accessed from outside of SQL Server, a is thrown. 這個屬性是唯讀的。This property is read-only.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property WindowsIdentity As WindowsIdentity

summary.span: 呼叫端的 Microsoft Windows 識別。

span.span: The Microsoft Windows identity of the caller.

value.span: 執行個體，表示呼叫端的 Windows 識別；如果使用 SQL Server 驗證 (SQL Server Authentication) 驗證用戶端，則為 。

span.span: A instance representing the Windows identity of the caller, or if the client was authenticated using SQL Server Authentication.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在 SQL Server 內的 common language runtime (CLR) 程式碼會永遠叫用處理序帳戶的內容中。Common language runtime (CLR) code inside SQL Server is always invoked in the context of the process account. 如果有必要的程式碼執行的動作，使用呼叫使用者的身分識別，而不 SQL Server 處理序身分識別，然後模擬語彙基元應該透過這個屬性取得。If it is necessary for the code to perform an action using calling user’s identity instead of the SQL Server process identity, then an impersonation token should be obtained through this property. 取得 物件之後，呼叫端可以模擬用戶端帳戶，並代表它執行動作。After obtaining the object, callers can impersonate the client account and perform actions on their behalf. 如果從 SQL Server 外部，叫用就會擲回。If invoked from outside SQL Server, a is thrown. 只有以 `EXTERNAL_ACCESS` 或 `UNSAFE` 使用權限標記的組件才能存取此屬性。Only assemblies marked with `EXTERNAL_ACCESS` or `UNSAFE` permissions can access this property. 這個屬性是唯讀的。This property is read-only. ## Examples 下列範例會示範如何取得呼叫用戶端的 Windows 身分識別，並模擬用戶端。The following example shows how to get the Windows identity of the calling client and impersonate the client. 「 模擬範例 」 SQL Server 線上叢書 》 中的模擬使用範例，請參閱 < 屬性。See "Impersonation Sample" in SQL Server Books Online for an example of impersonation using the property. [!code-csharp[DataWorks SqlContext.WindowsIdentity Sample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks SqlContext.WindowsIdentity Sample/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[DataWorks SqlContext.WindowsIdentity Sample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks SqlContext.WindowsIdentity Sample/VB/source.vb#1)]
